alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Sequoia NP; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 4:55PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Tulare County through 530 PM PDT... At 453 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Avenal, or 27 miles southwest of Hanford, moving west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and pea size hail. Brief heavy rain and lightning will be possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tulare, Lindsay, Farmersville, Exeter, Three Rivers, Woodville, Strathmore, Tipton, Lemon Cove and Lindcove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
